      • checkSave

        private boolean checkSave()
                   throws BadLocationException
        Checks if the graph is unsaved. If unsaved, the confirm dialog is called. If not unsaved, true is returned. True is also returned if the graph has been saved or "not save" is selected from the confirm dialog.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        BadLocationException

      • handleOpenGraphEvent

        private void handleOpenGraphEvent()
                           throws BadLocationException
        Handles an open graph event. An existing file must be selected for opening a graph.
        Throws:
        BadLocationException

      • handleSaveGraphAsEvent

        private int handleSaveGraphAsEvent()
                            throws BadLocationException
        Handles a save graph as event.
        The graph is saved in the selected file if:
        - the selected file don't exist
        - the selected file exists and "overwrite" is selected in the confirm dialog
        Returns:
        save result
        Throws:
        BadLocationException

      • handleSaveGraphEvent

        private int handleSaveGraphEvent()
                          throws BadLocationException
        Handles a save graph event.
        If the graphFile is null: handleSaveGraphAsEvent is called.
        If the graphFile is not null: the graph is saved in the existing graphFile.
        Returns:
        save result
        Throws:
        BadLocationException
